vote.title: This ordinance authorizes the appropriation and expenditure of up to $1,500,000.00 of 2022 HOME Investment Partnerships Program (HOME) funds from the U.S. Department of Housing and Urban Development; authorizes the Director of the Department of Development to enter into a commitment letter, loan agreement, promissory note, mortgage, and restrictive covenant with FF Preston Pointe, L.P. in an amount up to $1,500,000.00 for the Preston Pointe project; and to declare an emergency. ($1,500,000.00).
vote.description: A motion was made by Shayla Favor, seconded by Nicholas Bankston, that this Ordinance be Approved. The motion carried by the following vote:
